title: So42 westy full interior and set of windows on ebay

posts.content:
http://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/VW-Westfal...item27f80d4d3d

Small rear wardrobe- great condition but small laminate chip in top left corner..

Spice rack- good solid condition but has been repaired in the past with a plate in the top right, I have left the plate on but underneath there is as crack in the laminate but could all be fixed to look good..

Spice rack table- great

Main table and original leg- great

Main wardrobe- nice and solid the long side is good but the small door is missing the handle, the front panel is good apart from the damage at the bottom about 2" up, when it was fitted you did not really notice to bad but could do with fixing.

Roof cupboard- front panel is great very small laminate chip in one corner the sides are solid but the base which is bare ply is flaky, could easily be used as a template to cut a new one.

Buddy seat- in good condition just needs fixing together.

Rear cushion is good but small split underneath where it sits on the rear shelf

Rock and roll bed- the front panel, seats and hinges are good, the armrest has a split in the material, but the bottom of the base is very flaky ply and will need a panel cutting to be solid...

The interior needs a very good clean, the cushions are the original material and is dirty should clean up with the right stuff. THE INTERIOR IS LHD...

JUST ANOTHER NOTE JUST REMEMBER IT IS ALL OVER 40 YEARS OLD


http://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/VW-splitsc...65345853&rt=nc

This listing is for a set of four SO42 westfalia splitscreen jalousie louvered windows in great condition with all glass (unbroken) winders there and working they come with inner frames and fly screens... the windows will need a clean, polish and new seals and there good to go.....

any questions please ask CASH ON COLLECTION.......

Sorry just ebay links but I will try and edit more tonight when I get home also will add more pics later thanks everyone...

http://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/VW-splitscree ... 27f80da51e
The kitchen unit is there to but will post info and pics later
Fridge unit/ ice box which is in great condition and original so42...
can someone point me in the direction of instructions to post pictures thank you really appreciated...

You can add photos directly as you type the post if you use the full editor, there is a "Choose File" option at the bottom of the post reply page.



The other alternative is to open a Photobucket account, upload the pictures there and then copy and past the IMG link into your posts.

The westfalia plate on the r+r bed states
So42 638 1966..
Ok thanks
Both listings have been updated with pictures and descriptions and finish tonight thanks for all the interest everyone....
